topic: Synthesis methods, structural characteristics, and performance factors of metal-zeolite catalysts, with emphasis on MFI and BEA zeolites, for propane dehydrogenation (PDH) reactions
QuestionEnglish: Analyze the primary synthesis methods for metal-zeolite catalysts used in propane dehydrogenation (PDH) reactions, explaining why MFI and BEA topological zeolites dominate in this application. How do their structural characteristics and other factors contribute to their effectiveness, and what are the implications for future developments in PDH catalyst design?
QuestionChinese: 分析用于丙烷脱氢（PDH）反应的金属沸石催化剂的主要合成方法，解释为什么MFI和BEA拓扑结构的沸石在这一应用中占主导地位。它们的结构特征和其他因素如何影响其有效性，这对未来PDH催化剂设计有何启示？
